title: Data is Corrupt
body:
I have no idea what to do..   Every time I open up the League of Legends client a message pops up saying: 
_**"Data is corrupt. Your League of Legends files are corrupt. A repair will be started to address the issue. If you continue the experience this issue, please contact Player Support."**_
What do I do? And it doesn't  go away unless I restart my pc? 
Any Ideas of how to fix this?
Thanks! {{summoner:31}}

replies.body: Heya, is a repair not fixing this up?  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) in this case and see if a force repatch might do the trick.
